solution_line_template: If each line that Salem created in her poem has {words_per_line} words, the total number of words in a stanza, which is {lines_per_stanza} lines, is {words_per_line} words/line * {lines_per_stanza} lines/stanza = <<{words_per_line}*{lines_per_stanza}={words_per_stanza}>>{words_per_stanza} words/stanza

With {total_stanzas} stanzas, each containing {words_per_stanza} words per stanza, the total is {words_per_stanza} words/stanza * {total_stanzas} stanzas = <<{words_per_stanza}*{total_stanzas}={total_words_in_poem}>>{total_words_in_poem} words in all the stanzas(poem)
